Sequence Information.Peptide Name: Brevinin-1LA  (Also Brevinin-1PRd; natural AMPs; frog, amphibians, animals; XXU; 1S=S, UCSS1a)
Sequence Information.Source: Columbia Spotted Frog,Rana luteiventris; ALSO: the Oregon spotted frog  Rana pretiosa, Noth America

Literature Information.Literature: It contains one disulfide bond: 18, 24. Brevinin-1PRd isolated from the Oregon spotted frog shares the same sequence with this entry.Activity: Active against E. coli (MIC 50 uM), S. aureus (MIC 6 uM), C. albicans (MIC 12 uM).Toxicity: highly hemolytic (HC50 5 uM). For the entries similar to Brevinin-1PRd, please see AP1721-1723 (Conlon JM et al 2011 Dev Comp Immunol 35 (6), 644-9).Found in multiple species. Updated 11/2015; Jan2020
Literature Information.Author: Goraya J., Wang Y., Li Z., O'Flaherty M., Knoop FC., Platz JE., Conlon JM.2000
Literature Information.Title: Peptides with antimicrobial activity from four different families isolated from the skins of the North American frogs Rana luteiventris, Rana berlandieri and Rana pipiens.
